original_title: The Authority Crisis in the Church
overview: There is a serious issue regarding biblical authority in the church today. As many pastors across the nation increasingly trust man’s word more than God’s Word, this approach is causing kids and adults alike to reject the history in the Bible and the gospel of Jesus based in that history. This major problem in our modern church is illustrated in shocking video clips by well-known Christian leaders.
tagline: Don't miss Ken Ham's update on Genesis, compromise, and how to help your church stay committed to God's Word.
title: The Authority Crisis in the Church
